message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $60.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate it. I would like to counter with an offer of $50 for the product.
Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $65.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $60 for the product.
Hi Bob, thank you for your latest offer. I'm still not willing to go below $70. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer it to you for $67.50.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to find a middle ground. I would like to counter with an offer of $65 for the product.
Hi Bob, I understand you're getting close to your target price. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $68.
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with an offer of $66 for the product.
Hi Bob, I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer it to you for $69.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. I would like to counter with an offer of $67 for the product.
